description: Sweet Lorelei Lee has a dark side. If you've ever encountered it you know, once she's fired up stay back! Or else you will get burned. She's all ready running on a short fuse this morning. The last thing she needs is for some stupid little LA wanna-be subs getting in her way, not following the rules and making everyone's life more difficult. These girls just have no respect for the industry and for their coworkers. Well, un-lucky for them Lorelei Lee has taken it upon herself and her busy schedule to teach these two ginger skanks a well deserved lesson!
title: Ginger Skanks!
